title: Planted Chicken Skewers Tikka With Grilled Eggplant
instructions: Mix tikka paste with plant-based yogurt and coat the planted.chicken skewers. Marinate for at least 1 hour, or overnight for best results.
Slice the eggplants lengthwise into 1cm thick slices. Brush with olive oil and season with salt, pepper, and cumin.
Preheat your grill or grill pan to high heat.
Grill the eggplant slices for 4-5 minutes per side until tender and charred. Set aside.
Grill the marinated tikka skewers for 8-10 minutes, turning regularly until nicely charred on all sides.
Arrange the grilled eggplant on a serving platter, top with the tikka skewers.
Drizzle with tahini sauce, sprinkle with pomegranate seeds and fresh cilantro. Serve with warm flatbread.
